translation: ★ディト、石板を解読する。{#Name="トウモ"}
source: ★ディト、石板を解読する。{#Name="トウモ"}

translation: ★「要塞は天空に」という情報が。{#Name="トウモ"}
source: ★「要塞は天空に」という情報が。{#Name="トウモ"}

translation: ★「なんとか山に行けばいいんじゃない？」ｂｙディト{#Name="トウモ"}
source: ★「なんとか山に行けばいいんじゃない？」ｂｙディト{#Name="トウモ"}

translation: ★「ナントカ山って」{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★「ナントカ山って」{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ★なんかＲＰＧっぽくなってきてイライラするゼロ。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★なんかＲＰＧっぽくなってきてイライラするゼロ。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ★とりあえずナントカ山に行く。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★とりあえずナントカ山に行く。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Track down Four.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Track down Four.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Titan!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Titan!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: How many are there?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: How many are there?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Visibility's too low to see!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Visibility's too low to see!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Don't be stupid! Use your ears, fool!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't be stupid! Use your ears, fool!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Shit! My right leg's gone numb!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Shit! My right leg's gone numb!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Dammit, look at that frostbite!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Dammit, look at that frostbite!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Are you deaf, ladies? I said, march! Now MARCH!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Are you deaf, ladies? I said, march! Now MARCH!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We're all gonna turn into little soldier ice statues...{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We're all gonna turn into little soldier ice statues...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Sound off like you got a pair, men!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Sound off like you got a pair, men!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Yaaaaaah!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Yaaaaaah!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: How are they getting up the mountain so quickly!?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: How are they getting up the mountain so quickly!?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: That's no Intoner... It's a goddamn monster!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: That's no Intoner... It's a goddamn monster!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: {#Name="兵士B"}
source: {#Name="兵士B"}

translation: Dammit! I keep getting snow in my eyes!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Dammit! I keep getting snow in my eyes!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Keep going! You'll die if you stop moving!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Keep going! You'll die if you stop moving!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Tread carefully. That's Zero we're dealing with!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Tread carefully. That's Zero we're dealing with!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: If it's freeze to death or die in battle...I'm going down fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: If it's freeze to death or die in battle...I'm going down fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Keep moving, men! {#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Keep moving, men! {#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: I c-can't...stop...sh-shivering...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I c-can't...stop...sh-shivering...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Move! Move, move, move!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Move! Move, move, move!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Look out! She's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Look out! She's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Where is she!? I can't see her! Ahhhh, get away! Get away from me!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Where is she!? I can't see her! Ahhhh, get away! Get away from me!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: {#Name="兵士G"}
source: {#Name="兵士G"}

translation: Stop, you idiot! You're attacking us!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Stop, you idiot! You're attacking us!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I...I won't last much longer... P-Protect Lady Four for me...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: I...I won't last much longer... P-Protect Lady Four for me...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Praise be to our noble songstress!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Praise be to our noble songstress!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Son of a bitch, I can't even walk in this.{LF}Fuckin' snow!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Son of a bitch, I can't even walk in this.{LF}Fuckin' snow!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Heh. Nice thought, but it's not gonna happen.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Heh. Nice thought, but it's not gonna happen.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Y'know, maybe we should've{LF}ridden on Mikhail after all.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Y'know, maybe we should've{LF}ridden on Mikhail after all.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Didn't you hear him? It's cold as hell up there.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Didn't you hear him? It's cold as hell up there.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We shoulda had your dumb dragon melt it for us.{#Name="Dito"}
source: We shoulda had your dumb dragon melt it for us.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Yeah, right. He'd probably miss{LF}and burn us to cinders.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, right. He'd probably miss{LF}and burn us to cinders.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hah! Yeah, that sounds like Mikhail, all right.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hah! Yeah, that sounds like Mikhail, all right.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Is he gonna be okay?{LF}Visibility can't be good up there.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Is he gonna be okay?{LF}Visibility can't be good up there.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: He'll be fine. He's actually tougher than he looks.{#Name="Zero"}
source: He'll be fine. He's actually tougher than he looks.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm sure we'll see him again soon.{LF}...Sometime. ...Probably.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm sure we'll see him again soon.{LF}...Sometime. ...Probably.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Your optimism is overwhelming.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Your optimism is overwhelming.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Uh... Maybe you should call your dragon.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh... Maybe you should call your dragon.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Yeah, no shit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, no shit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Come on, Zero! Call him already!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Come on, Zero! Call him already!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Shut your trap! I'm trying, okay!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut your trap! I'm trying, okay!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've BEEN calling him, but he's not answering!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've BEEN calling him, but he's not answering!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uh oh. That's not good.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh oh. That's not good.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Probably just flew out of range or something.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Probably just flew out of range or something.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You don't think maybe Four captured him, do you?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You don't think maybe Four captured him, do you?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: No way.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No way.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Four's disciple is pretty ripped, you know.{LF}I'm thinkin' he could probably take a dragon.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Four's disciple is pretty ripped, you know.{LF}I'm thinkin' he could probably take a dragon.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: {#Name="ディト"}
source: {#Name="ディト"}

translation: No one "takes" a dragon. Even a stupid{LF}idiot dragon. He'll be fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No one "takes" a dragon. Even a stupid{LF}idiot dragon. He'll be fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: {#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Man, you're so cheery.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Man, you're so cheery.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Gya, I'm sick of these fuckers!{LF}And WHERE'S MY DRAGON!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Gya, I'm sick of these fuckers!{LF}And WHERE'S MY DRAGON!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: {#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Okaaay. I'm gonna vote we never do that again.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Okaaay. I'm gonna vote we never do that again.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Stupid pussy snow. I wasn't yelling that loudly.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stupid pussy snow. I wasn't yelling that loudly.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Seriously? She's blaming the snow?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously? She's blaming the snow?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What was that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What was that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uh, nothing? Nothing at all.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh, nothing? Nothing at all.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: うわーん！ゼロ！会いたかったよぉ！会いたかったよぉ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: うわーん！ゼロ！会いたかったよぉ！会いたかったよぉ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: ねえ。ボクと会えない間、さびしかった？さびしかった？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ねえ。ボクと会えない間、さびしかった？さびしかった？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: うるさい！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: うるさい！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: よし！いいぞ。全滅させろ！！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: よし！いいぞ。全滅させろ！！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: この敵、全部やっつけるの？悪い人だけにしない？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: この敵、全部やっつけるの？悪い人だけにしない？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 善いと悪いの定義はどうする？面倒臭い。皆殺しでいいよ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 善いと悪いの定義はどうする？面倒臭い。皆殺しでいいよ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: これだけ飛んでいると、さすがにボクも寒くなってきた{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: これだけ飛んでいると、さすがにボクも寒くなってきた{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: ……ハックショッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ……ハックショッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: みんな、フォウのこととても好きみたい。{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: みんな、フォウのこととても好きみたい。{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: いいウタヒメ様なんだよ、きっと{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: いいウタヒメ様なんだよ、きっと{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: この先は狭くなっている。私とディトで行こう{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: この先は狭くなっている。私とディトで行こう{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: え！もう１人ぼっちはいやだよ。ボクもいっしょに行く！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: え！もう１人ぼっちはいやだよ。ボクもいっしょに行く！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 無理だ。入れないだろ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 無理だ。入れないだろ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ギューッてすれば入れるよ！入れるよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ギューッてすれば入れるよ！入れるよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: わっ。バカ！やめろ！崩落させる気か！{#Name="ディト"}
source: わっ。バカ！やめろ！崩落させる気か！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: もう一度言うよ。私とディトで地上をいく。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: もう一度言うよ。私とディトで地上をいく。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: キミは上空からだ。わかったか？返事は？{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: キミは上空からだ。わかったか？返事は？{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ……うん{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ……うん{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 『うん』なんて返事はないッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 『うん』なんて返事はないッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: は、はい{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: は、はい{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 今度は迷子になっちゃダメだぞ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 今度は迷子になっちゃダメだぞ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Whew! Looks like the wind's{LF}finally died down a bit.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Whew! Looks like the wind's{LF}finally died down a bit.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Yeah. Let's hope it stays this way.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah. Let's hope it stays this way.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey. That thing was created with Intoner magic.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey. That thing was created with Intoner magic.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Huh. Neat. Must be something{LF}nearby worth protecting then.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh. Neat. Must be something{LF}nearby worth protecting then.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: {#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: {#Name="ディト"}
source: {#Name="ディト"}

translation: Ah! Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Ah! Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Where the hell have you been, dummy!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Where the hell have you been, dummy!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, the sky was all white with{LF}snow and stuff, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, the sky was all white with{LF}snow and stuff, you know?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I was flying really hard, and the next thing I knew,{LF}I was two mountain ranges away from you!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I was flying really hard, and the next thing I knew,{LF}I was two mountain ranges away from you!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And while I was over there, I ran into{LF}this really strange dragon, and then—{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And while I was over there, I ran into{LF}this really strange dragon, and then—{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Just shut up and give me a hand already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just shut up and give me a hand already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! I'm here for you! I'm here to help!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! I'm here for you! I'm here to help!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You don't need to tell me that every damn time!{#Name="Zero"}
source: You don't need to tell me that every damn time!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? What the hell is that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Huh? What the hell is that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Read it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Read it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah, yeah. Hold on. Let's see here...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, yeah. Hold on. Let's see here...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: The jewel bearing the revered one ascends to the heavens from{LF}Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden, leaving a silvery shadow in its wake.{#Name="Dito"}
source: The jewel bearing the revered one ascends to the heavens from{LF}Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden, leaving a silvery shadow in its wake.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ヴェルンシュタイン・オブ・ザ・ヴァイス・ノルデン山より白銀の影を残して上天せり{#Name="ディト"}
source: ヴェルンシュタイン・オブ・ザ・ヴァイス・ノルデン山より白銀の影を残して上天せり{#Name="ディト"}

translation: {#Name="ディト"}
source: {#Name="ディト"}

translation: You wanna try that again in English?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You wanna try that again in English?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What do you think it means?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What do you think it means?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Your guess is as good as mine. But I know that I've definitely{LF}heard of Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden before.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Your guess is as good as mine. But I know that I've definitely{LF}heard of Mt. Bernstein of the Vice Norden before.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: {#Name="ディト"}
source: {#Name="ディト"}

translation: {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: {#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Fine. We'll go check out Mount...Whatever.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Fine. We'll go check out Mount...Whatever.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yay! We're going to Mt. Whatever!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Yay! We're going to Mt. Whatever!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Diverted by false information regarding Four's whereabouts,{#Name="433"}
source: Diverted by false information regarding Four's whereabouts,{#Name="433"}

translation: Zero found herself on the hunt once more.{#Name="163"}
source: Zero found herself on the hunt once more.{#Name="163"}

translation: Guided by the faint Intoner presence they detected,{#Name="289"}
source: Guided by the faint Intoner presence they detected,{#Name="289"}

translation: the group narrowed their search to a snowcapped range in the mountains...{#Name="379"}
source: the group narrowed their search to a snowcapped range in the mountains...{#Name="379"}

translation: Ah, crap. Spirits.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ah, crap. Spirits.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Friends of yours?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Friends of yours?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I don't have friends.{#Name="Dito"}
